name: HKP-Notebook
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'set -e && curl --proto "=https" --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://get-ghcup.haskell.org | BOOTSTRAP_HASKELL_NONINTERACTIVE=1 BOOTSTRAP_HASKELL_INSTALL_NO_STACK=1 sh && export PATH=$HOME/.ghcup/bin:$PATH && ghcup install ghc recommended && ghcup install cabal recommended && ghcup set ghc recommended && ghcup set cabal recommended'
